额。。。eve 什么bbic是啥玩意。。。另外发现1楼签名档值得用估狗翻译好好研究一下！

edit:The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics
Here the birds are singing, trees do not grow,
And only we, shoulder-to-shoulder grows in the ground here.

edit2：我发现我根本读不懂“鸟儿在歌唱”后面的“小树长不高”是啥意思。。。
